projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Developed a portfolio website to showcase my background, and sharing blog posts.

projects.title: Web3 Ordinals Hub
projects.description: Built a Web3 hub for Ordinals creators and community, featuring a high-tech Discord bot to enhance user engagement and community efficiency where maintaining over 8000 users.

projects.title: Raven's Progressive Matrices Agent
projects.description: An AI agent to address Raven's Progressive Matrices intelligence test.

projects.title: Fantasy Music
projects.description: A web app that allows you to create fantasy leagues based on brackets of music artists chosen from Spotify's Top 50 weekly charts.

projects.title: Monster Classification Agent
projects.description: An AI agent capable of diagnosing diseases in monsters.

projects.title: Block World Problem
projects.description: Creating an algorithm to transform arbitrary initial arrangements of blocks into a specified goal arrangement.

projects.title: Sheep & Wolves
projects.description: An AI agent that can solve the Sheep and Wolves problem for an arbitrary number of initial wolves and sheep using Semantic Networks.

projects.title: Crime Rate Prediction
projects.description: Predicting Crime Rate of Cities in Georgia Based on Demographics And House Rents.

projects.title: Game Critics Web App
projects.description: A web app that allows users to rate and review games.
